EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_30002;[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetblorgLetterBlessing].\n\nIt has come to the attention of the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortBlorgEmperorName] that merchants from your lands have been acting with deceit and dishonesty while conducting trade with our merchants. We are certain that you will make sure that this behavior will cease immediately.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_30002;We need to restrict the privileges of the major trade guilds.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_30002;I'll have [target_marshal.GetFirstName] seek out and deal with the worst troublemakers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_BLORG_CO_30002;How our merchants conduct their trade is no business for the crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_30003;I should make sure that I'm in good standing with [From.GetFirstName].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_30004;Your vassal
column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: was less than impressed by your intrusion on merchant rights in the cities of [From.GetHerHis] lands. [From.GetSheHeCap] has now made a public statement on how this action was an unjustified use of power in an area of [From.GetHerHis] responsibility.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_30004;[From.GetHerHisCap] merchants had to be kept in line!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_30011;Last night
column2: [blorg_courtier.GetBestName] and I ended up having discussions until dawn
column3: about [blorg_courtier.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]. I must have made a good impression
column4: as [blorg_courtier.GetSheHe] told me that [blorg_courtier.GetSheHe] will be sending a letter
column5: praising the hospitality [blorg_courtier.GetSheHe] has received.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_30011;A pleasant evening.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_30011;I need to make sure that everyone knows about this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_30012;I have noticed that [blorg_courtier.GetBestName] has grown increasingly aggravated during the last couple of weeks
column2: and today something extra unthoughtful slipped my tongue which caused [blorg_courtier.GetHerHim] to storm off exclaiming that the Emperor would hear about this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_30012;This might upset our relations with [offmap_blorg.Governor.Offmap.GetShortName].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_ADV_3_A;To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column2: \nMy [Root.GetLordLady]
column3: you are a [Root.GetManWoman] blessed with prosperous lands and a beautiful family! It would honor me greatly to take care of either the county of [selling_province.GetName] or your [marriage_child.GetDaughterSon]
column4: [marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]. This would ensure a lasting peace between us.\n\nSigned
column5: \n[From.GetTitledName];;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_ADV_3_B;To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column2: \nMy [Root.GetLordLady]
column3: your prosperous lands mark you as a [Root.GetTitle] of impressive abilities. I have an offer for you which would ensure a lasting peace between us. Let me rule the county of [selling_province.GetName] in your name
column4: and no one shall dare to touch it again.\n\nSigned
column5: \n[From.GetTitledName];;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_ADV_3;[selling_province.GetName] is a fine county
column2: indeed. It can be yours for the right price.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_ADV_3_TT;Offer your county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§! to the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤. If [From.GetSheHe] accepts
column2: [From.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB_ADV_3_TT;Offer the county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§!
column2: which is ruled by your vassal §Y[selling_province.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§!
column3: to the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤. If [From.GetSheHe] accepts
column4: [From.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.\n\nHowever
column5: your remaining vassals will be displeased
column6: resulting in the following effect:\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC_ADV_3;[marriage_child.GetFirstName] will make you an excellent [marriage_child.GetHusbandWife].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_ADV_3_TT;Through the marriage
column2: you form a non-aggression pact with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTD_ADV_3;A threat dressed up in compliments is still a threat
column2: [GetRootFromInsult]!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTD_ADV_3_TT;Refuse to make a deal with the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_ADV_4;To the wise and noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
column2: \nI would be a fool not to accept such a generous offer. I will proudly serve as your vassal
column3: and [selling_province.GetName] shall prosper in my care. This I swear!\n\nSigned
column4: \n[From.GetTitledName];;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_ADV_4;I am glad we managed to solve this peacefully.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_ADV_5;If it will ensure peace
column2: I must agree.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTD_ADV_5;Outrageous! We will meet again on the battlefield!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_ADV_5_tooltip;All other vassals opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y5§! years. §Y(Sold Vassal County)§!\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20002_A;[Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetblorgLetterBlessing].\n\nTo strengthen the relationship between our nations
column2: my [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress] has sent me on a mission to your demesne. It would honor me to visit your court and [From.GetCGMission].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20002_B;[Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetblorgLetterBlessing].\n\nTo further solidify the bonds between our nations and ensure peaceful cooperation
column2: my [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress] has sent me on a mission to your demesne. I shall visit your court and [From.GetCGMission].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20002;The servants of the [From.Liege.GetTitle] are always welcome in my realm.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_20002;I have no time to entertain guests at present.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20002_TT;The [From.GetJobTitle] of §Y[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§!
column2: §Y[From.GetTitle]§!
column3: will pay a visit to your demesne.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_20002_TT;Your refusal is a great insult to §Y[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.Liege.GetHerHis] [From.GetJobTitle] §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20004;After a tour of [Root.Capital.GetName] and a fortnight at my court
column2: [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s visit has reached its end. Thanks to the meticulous preparations made by my [corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle]
column3: [corresponding_councilor.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: everything went smoothly. The [From.GetJobTitle] has returned home with [From.GetCGMissionOutcome] for [From.GetHerHis] [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: GetCGMissionOutcome_diplomatic_visit;expertly composed letters;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
GetCGMissionOutcome_oversee_troops;a reassuring report;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
GetCGMissionOutcome_study_military;new martial knowledge;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
GetCGMissionOutcome_oversee_tax_collection;heavy coffers;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
GetCGMissionOutcome_trade;several new trade agreements;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
GetCGMissionOutcome_preaching;tales of pious subjects;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
GetCGMissionOutcome_study_theology;new scrolls of philosophy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20005;As the welcoming feast ends
column2: [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] and I retreat to finish our conversation in private
column3: observing the moon from the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] walls. Suddenly
column4: bright lights streak across the sky
column5: and the [From.GetJobTitle]'s visage turns ashen. 'Bad omen
column6: ' mutters the translator and the two [From.GetMenWomen] make a hasty departure.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20005;Wait
column2: come back! We were getting on so well!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20005_tt;§Y[From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]§! departs immediately as [From.GetSheHe] believes [From.GetHerHis] visit has been cursed by Heaven.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20006;The preparations for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival tomorrow are well under way
column2: but I find myself pondering what more I could do to make [From.GetHerHim] feel welcome. Even though a proficient translator has been summoned
column3: would it not be a nice gesture for me to greet [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] native tongue?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC_BLORG_CO_20006;How fortunate that I already know the basics of the language!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD_BLORG_CO_20006;It would be unwise. I cannot hope to rival the translator's skill.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20006_SUCCESS_TT;a successful night of study. Your greeting tomorrow will be impeccable.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
student_of_language_tt;§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! gets '§YStudent of Language§!'
column2:
giving §G+1§! Learning.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
multilingual_tt;§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! gets '§YMultilingual§!', giving §G+1§! Learning and §G+1§! Diplomacy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20006_FAILURE_TT;you falling asleep while studying
column2: causing you to be late to the audience tomorrow.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_20006_SUCCESS_TT;you making a good attempt at the greeting.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_20006_FAILURE_TT;you making a flawed attempt at the greeting.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_BLORG_CO_20006_TT;As you are multilingual
column2: you greet the visitor flawlessly.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20007;I asked the translator to not only instruct me in the proper pronunciation
column2: but also teach me the grammar and meaning behind the words. It took many hours
column3: but the pleased look on [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName]'s [FromFrom.GetFaceDescription] face as I greet [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in flawless Blorg proves that it was worth the effort.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20007;Language holds more power than most [Root.GetMenWomen] understand.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20008;'My [Root.GetLordLady]
column2: please wake up!' I sit up with a start. Where am I? My eyes dart around the room. The library! 'The guests are waiting! Forgive me
column3: my [Root.GetLordLady]
column4: we didn't know where you were. We've been searching the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] for hours!' I bury my face in my hands. I have not yet received my guests
column5: and the visit is already a disaster...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20008;Curse those early risers
column2: the sun is barely up!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20009;I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed
column2: and as I dressed this morning
column3: [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was there to help me with the pronunciation. I have no idea what the elaborate phrases mean
column4: but at least they come out somewhat smoothly as I greet [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20009;That went well
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20010;I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed. However
column2: as I stood before [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName] this morning
column3: it was as if someone had wiped the words from my mind! I forgot every other word and stuttered something awful...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20010;I have never been so mortified!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
multilingual_option_available_tt;This option is available to you because you have the modifier §YMultilingual§!.\n\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20011;I had my servant buy an exquisite Blorg garb with the proper accessories in preparation for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival. However
column2: as I welcomed [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetHerHis] entourage
column3: the sight of my new robe seemed to displease [From.GetHerHim]! Later
column4: the translator told me I wore several attributes exclusive to the [From.Liege.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]'s family.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20011;Guards! Find me the merchant responsible!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20012;As I am walking in the gardens with my guest [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] I comment on the sunny skies. The translator repeats my words and after a moment of thought
column2: [From.GetDynName] replies with ardent enthusiasm. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] thinks my pleasantries are a metaphor for the enlightened nature of the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20012;I never knew talking about the weather could be so fruitful!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

blorg_imperial_marriage;Request Imperial Marriage;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
blorg_imperial_marriage_prince_effect_tt;An imperial prince of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! arrives to marry §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
blorg_imperial_marriage_princess_effect_tt;An imperial princess of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! arrives to marry §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20048_SUPPORTIVE;Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince]
column2: [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetblorgComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected  the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks  no
column3: they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers
column4: you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching
column5: holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName]'s eyes are cast low as [From.GetSheHe] exits to greet you
column6: but for the shortest moment they dart up to meet yours. The tiniest of smiles plays at the corners of [From.GetHerHis] mouth
column7: and a soft blush tints [From.GetHerHis] cheeks. The sight is a balm to your frayed nerves. Surely
column8: you can make this work.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20048_DECISIVE;Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince]
column2: [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetblorgComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected  the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks  no
column3: they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers
column4: you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching
column5: holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName] does not wait for the servants to open the litter door. [From.GetSheHeCap] gets out on [From.GetHerHis] own and strides towards you
column6: no hesitation slowing [From.GetHerHis] step. As you meet [From.GetHerHis] steady gaze
column7: it is clear that you are looking at a [From.GetManWoman] who will either become your strongest ally
column8: or your most dangerous enemy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20048_SOCIABLE;Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince]
column2: [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetblorgComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected  the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks  no
column3: they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers
column4: you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching
column5: holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName]'s face shines like a sun as [From.GetSheHe] steps down to greet you. [From.GetHerHisCap] gaze wanders across the crowd
column6: acknowledging each and every courtier in your personal retinue
column7: before locking eyes with you. Murmurs of approval confirm that you are not alone to be struck by the [From.GetPrincessPrince]'s charm.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_20048_CONSERVATIVE;Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince]
column2: [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetblorgComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected  the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks  no
column3: they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers
column4: you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching
column5: holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\nIt is no mere [From.GetManWoman] who steps down from the litter
column6: but a creature of pure
column7: ethereal favour. [From.GetSheHeCap] does not walk across the courtyard to meet you  [From.GetSheHe] glides. Awe mingles with a tiny sliver of dread as you look upon [From.GetHerHis] emotionless face. How has a [Root.GetManWoman] like you come to deserve such a noble [From.GetBrideGroom]?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_20049_TT;§Y[imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! are now married.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: has now married the imperial [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]. The grand ceremony and the foreign [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] will be the talk of the realm for many years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column4: some might also argue that it is to ensure that a ruler feels worthy of being chronicled.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_10011;My [adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation] [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName] has offered to travel to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]
column2: on a mission to bring glory to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. 'Please
column3: my [Root.GetLordLady]'
column4: [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] says. 'Let a humble servant strengthen your relations with the [the_protector_general.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortBlorgEmperorName]!';;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10011;What a brilliant idea! Go
column2: with my blessing.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10011_TT;§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! lights up like the sun
column2: before rushing off to pack [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] belongings.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_10011;I think [back_up_target_1.GetTitledFirstName] is better suited for the journey.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: as §Y[back_up_target_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! is ordered to go in [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] stead.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC_BLORG_CO_10011;I'm sorry
column2: but [back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName] would give a better impression of us...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC_BLORG_CO_10011_TT;§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! looks disappointed
column2: as §Y[back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! is ordered to go in [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] stead.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTD_BLORG_CO_10011;Absolutely not! You are needed here
column2: [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

out_traveling;On a Journey;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
out_traveling_desc;This character is currently out traveling and seeing the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_10013;One morning I wake up before my guards have attempted to rouse me. I hear excited chatter coming from the main hall
column2: and as I open the [Root.GetChamberOpening] there is a bustle of servants filling the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. '[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from the court of the [the_protector_general.GetTitle]!' they gossip.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10013;And [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] comes bearing gifts? Excellent!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10013_TT;§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! is proud to bring souvenirs from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName].\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_10014;'The [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] is a fascinating place
column2: my [Root.GetLordLady]' [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] says
column3: as I turn the foreign coins over in my hand. [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHeCap] arrived this morning
column4: and besides the obvious souvenirs
column5: [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] comes carrying many a tale from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels  everyone in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] wants to know everything.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10014_TT;The journey of §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] was a success!\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_10015;[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] returned to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] late last night
column2: seemingly exhausted from the journey. Today
column3: during the briefing
column4: [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] simply appears relieved to be home again. Just as I begin to worry about the impression [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] must have made throughout [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels
column5: [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] offers me a sealed letter of greeting from the [the_protector_general.GetTitle] [the_protector_general.GetHerselfHimself]!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10015;Not a complete failure then!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_10016;[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has returned from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels. When my council inquire about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] impressions of the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] lets out an exasperated sigh. Then [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] unleashes a tirade about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeblorgConvoTopic].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10016;This is not what I had hoped for...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10016_TT;You lose a bit of favour.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_10017;[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has finally returned from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]! However
column2: when asked about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] adventures
column3: [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] just mutters
column4: mostly about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeblorgConvoTopic].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10017;I should have sent someone else in [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]'s stead.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10017_TT;You lose some favour.\n;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10018;Oh
column2: how lovely! Welcome to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_10019;There is something different about [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]  as we discuss [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] speaks passionately about [adventurous_spirit.GetblorgConvoTopic]. 'Oh
column2: my [Root.GetLordLady]. You must let me go back'
column3: [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] pleads.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_10019;If this is what you want...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC6360;A loud sneeze interrupts [Root.GetMyMarshalName] [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]'s speech on the importance of camp hygiene. 'I am sorry
column2: my [Root.GetLordLady]
column3: ' mutters [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: the [Root.GetSpymasterName]
column5: casting a quick glance at the cat on my lap. 'If you could only leave the creature out of our meetings
column6: this would not happen again

column1: EVTOPTA6360;How dare you blame little innocent Mittens?!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB6360;Perhaps you are right
column2: [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]. The council is no place for a cat.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC6361;I am awoken by a soft pat on my cheek. 'Oh
column2: Mittens. Are you having trouble falling asleep?' She jumps down from my bed and starts pawing at the door. 'Let's go to the kitchen and get you some warm milk.' But as I close my bedroom door behind me
column3: Mittens heads in the opposite direction.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA6361;Follow Mittens down the dark corridor.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB6361;Go to the kitchen
column2: she is sure to follow.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC6362;As I round a corner
column2: I spot Mittens' fluffy tail as she squeezes through the chamber door of my [Root.GetSpymasterName]
column3: [Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName]! I enter
column4: finding Mittens curled up on [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] chest
column5: licking [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] face
column6: but [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] does not react. The [Root.job_spymaster.GetManWoman] before me is completely still
column7: not even breathing
column8: and [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] face is strangely swollen...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA6362;You have discovered a murder
column2: Mittens! Clever kitty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC6363;Apparently
column2: it was not bad enough when that stupid animal glared at us from the safety of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s lap. Now it has its own chair
column3: and a seat on the council
column4: to boot! The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has informed us that the former [FromFrom.GetSpymasterName] was poisoned
column5: but a servant who helped move the body insist that the [FromFrom.GetSpymasterName] was suffocated...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA6363;Is anyone on the council safe? This is a catastrophe!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_2100;My heart burns with fervor upon hearing of the poor [Root.Religion.GetName] souls being oppressed in the realm of [liberate_target.GetBestName]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] intended for all true believers to be free to decide their own fate
column2: but if [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is preoccupied with divine things perhaps I should carry out the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_2100;I must liberate my [Root.Religion.GetName] brethren!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_2100;I have better things to do...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
cb_opportunity_liberate;Gain one use of the §YLiberate Religion§! Casus Belli
column2: to be used on any valid target of your choosing.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cb_opportunity_liberate_deny;You decide that your time is better spent elsewhere. You will not be presented with this opportunity again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_2000;That [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has declared war upon me with the presumed notion to free hostages I have rightfully captured! This gives me just cause to execute them
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_2000;This war must end
column2: offer to send their people back.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_2000;I must make an example
column2: execute [chosen_captive.GetFirstName].;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC_BLORG_CO_2000;How dare they? Execute ALL captives!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD_BLORG_CO_2000;We shall meet on the battlefield.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_2001;[From.GetBestName] has sent an envoy with an offer - if we were to end this war
column2: [From.GetSheHe] will release all the captives and allow them safe passage to our court!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_2001;Excellent! We accept.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_2001;Ha! I am in this for the loot and plunder
column2: the war is still on!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_2002;[From.GetBestName] has accepted our offer to release the captives
column2: the war is over!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_2002;It is for the best.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_2003;[From.GetBestName] had the guts to deny our offer. Apparently
column2: the lives of the captives do not mean anything to [From.GetHerHim] - it was all a ruse to declare war!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_2003;The war goes on.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_BLORG_CO_2003;Let us see if they mean little to [From.GetHerHim] when they are all dead!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_2004;Disaster! In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has beheaded [chosen_captive.GetFirstName]! We should have seen this coming...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_2004;Oh
column2: now it is personal!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_2005;In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has has all captives beheaded! We should have seen this coming...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_BLORG_CO_2005;This is a war of vengeance now!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

tributary_permanent_cb_desc;§Y$TARGET$§! is weak
column2:
but if they would just pay you tribute in the form of gold and soldiers you could protect them!

Through war you can force any realm that you or one of your §YTributary States§! border to pay you §Y20%§! of their income and §Y15%§! of their levy reinforcements as tribute.
Will only break free if the §YSuzerain§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!
column3: is §RNOT§! §YIndependent§!
column4: has §Rless§! §YRealm Size§! than the §YTributary State§! or §Rdeclines a defensive§! §YCall to Arms§! from the §YTributary State§!.\nThis type of §YTributary§! can §RNOT§! be called to war.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1:
tributary_cb_desc;§Y$TARGET$§! is rich and should pay tribute to you!

Through war you can force any realm that you border to pay you §Y40%§! of their income as tribute.

This type of §YTributary§! can be called to war.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

it is time for them to pay tribute or be crushed underneath the thundering hooves of my horde!

Will only break free if the §YSuzerain§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can be called to war.
This type of §YTributary§! can call you into their wars
column3: but you are not forced to accept their §YCall to Arms§!.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

blorg_stable_desc;The [Root.GetName] is experiencing a period of internal stability
column2: and trade with Africa is profitable. Without any large-scale disasters or powerful enemies prosperity is able to spread
column3: and the military might of the Blorg Commonality stands ready to defend both its own wealth and its loyal tributaries.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: blorg_unrest_desc;Civil unrest runs rampant in the [Root.GetName]
column2: and it has thrown the trade routes with the South into disarray. The Blorg Commonality's armies are occupied internally in an attempt to keep the peace
column3: and unless the unrest is quelled soon a full-blown civil war may well erupt at any moment.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: blorg_civil_war_desc;Civil war has erupted in the [Root.GetName]
column2: and trade with the Heavens suffers as a result. The Commonality's armies are arrayed against one another
column3: and the ruling dynasty itself is threatened. Intrepid generals may well seek their fortune in the Earth
column4: beyond the Blorg Commonality's borders.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: blorg_mongol_invasion_desc;The  hordes of the south pour into the Blorg Commonality. The mighty Blorg armies are occupied with their desperate defense of the Commonality
column2: and the fighting has greatly disrupted trade as well as caused a mass exodus of refugees. Scions of the current dynasty may well flee northward if the war goes poorly enough.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: blorg_plague_desc;A terrible disease wracks the [Root.GetName]
column2: leaving thousands lying dead in its wake. Trade has ground to a halt as the Blorg Commonality's economy has been forced to its knees
column3: and even the Commonality's armies have been decimated to but a shadow of their former glory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: blorg_golden_age_desc;The [Root.GetName] has reached untold power and wealth. As the Blorg Commonality flourishes
column2: the trade routes to the Golden Coast bring not only valuable goods in previously unheard-of quantities
column3: but also rich and abundant examples of Blorg culture. An Emperor of the Blorg Commonality in this Golden Age may well rightfully consider [Root.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself] the [Root.Ruler.GetMasterMistress] of all Africa.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: raise_blorg_honor_guard;Raise Blorg Honor Guard;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_40001_A;[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetblorgLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetblorgComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has decreed that it is in the [offmap_blorg.GetName]'s interests that a new
column2: vibrant city be established on the trade routes to the North. This would be a feat worthy of favourable trade agreements
column3: as well as [offmap_blorg.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] personal notice.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_40001_C;[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetblorgLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetblorgComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has decreed that it is in the [offmap_blorg.GetName]'s interests to bestow favourable trade agreements on the [Root.GetTitle] most worthy of such association. They may well also find themselves blessed with [offmap_blorg.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] personal appreciation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: [From.GetTitledName] has called forth the greatest warriors of the land to defend the Patriarch of Alexandria. This newly formed order of Saint Anthony will safeguard the Miaphysite faith against all heathens.;Alors que le monde est plongé dans une période de guerres saintes
column3: [From.Get_le_TitledName] a appelé les plus grands guerriers du pays à défendre le Patriarche d'Alexandrie. Cet Ordre de Saint Antoine protégera la foi miaphysite contre tous les infidèles.;Als die Welt in eine Zeit der heiligen Kriege stürzte

column5: um den Patriarchen von Alexandria zu verteidigen. Dieser neugebildete Orden des Heiligen Antonius wird den miaphysitischen Glauben gegen alle Heiden schützen.;;Cuando el mundo cae en un periodo de guerras santas

manichean_DESC;Manichaeism is a Gnostic religion founded by the alleged Prophet Mani who was put to death by Sassanid Shahanshah Bahram I in 277 A.D. His 'Religion of Light' incorporated elements of Christianity
column2: Zoroastrianism
column3: Buddhism and Gnosticism. In the game
column4: Manichaeism is regarded as Zoroastrian heresy with its own special mechanics. The formal head of the religion is Yamag
column5: who normally resides in Samarkand.;Le manichéisme est une religion gnostique fondée par le prétendu Prophète Mani
column6: mis à mort par le Sassanide Shahanshah Bahram Ier en 277 apr. J.-C. Sa « Religion de la Lumière » incorpore des éléments du christianisme
column7: du zoroastrisme
column8: du bouddhisme et du gnosticisme. Dans le jeu
column9: le manichéisme est considéré comme une hérésie zoroastrienne avec ses propres mécaniques. Le chef officiel de cette religion est l'yamag
column10: qui réside habituellement à Samarcande.;Der Manichäismus ist eine gnostische Religion
column11: die von dem angeblichen Propheten Mani
column12: der von Sassanid Shahanshah Bahram I 277 n. Chr. zum Tode verurteilt wurde
column13: gegründet wurde. Seine Religion des Lichts" hat Elemente des Christentums"
column14: des Zoroastrismus
column15: des Buddhismus und des Gnostizismus eingebunden. Im Spiel gilt der Manichäismus als zoroastrische Ketzerei mit eigener Spezialmechanik. Der offizielle Kopf der Religion ist Yamag
column16: der normalerweise in Samarkand wohnt.;;El maniqueísmo es una religión gnóstica fundada por el supuesto profeta Mani que fue ejecutado por el sasánida Shahanshah Bahram I en el año 277 D.C. Su 'religión de la luz' unía elementos del cristianismo
column17: zoroastrianismo
column18: budismo y gnosticismo. En el juego
column19: el maniqueísmo se considera una herejía zoroastriana con sus propias mecánicas especiales. La cabeza formal de la religión es el Yamag

column2: it is your duty to call forth warriors to defend the Manichean faith.;À mesure que l'âge des Croisades et du Jihad renouvelé se profile
column3: il est de votre devoir d'appeler les guerriers à défendre la foi manichéenne.;In Zeiten von Kreuzzügen und Dschihads ist es unsere Pflicht
column4: Krieger aufzurufen
column5: um den manichäischen Glauben zu verteidigen.;;Según se avecina la edad de las cruzadas y una jihad renovada
column6: es tu deber convocar guerreros para defender la fe maniquea.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: celebrate_bema_desc;Hold a Bema festival to celebrate life of the prophet Mani.;Organiser une fête de Bêma pour célébrer la vie du Prophète Mani.;Halte ein Bema-Fest ab
column2: um das Leben des Propheten Mani zu feiern.;;Celebra la fiesta del Bema para festejar la vida del profeta Mani.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bema_celebrations;Holding Bema festival;Organise une fête de Bêma;Hält Bema-Fest ab;;Celebrando el Bema;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC39812;Bema is the most important religious event for us Manicheans. It is held in honor of the Prophet Mani and his suffering at the hands of Shahanshah Shapur I. During vernal equinox
column2: we gather to remember the deeds of our prophet.;La fête de Bêma est l'événement religieux le plus important pour nous
column3: les manichéens. Elle est tenue en l'honneur du Prophète Mani et de ses souffrances aux mains de Shahanshah Shapur Ier. Pendant l'équinoxe de printemps
column4: nous nous rassemblons pour nous rappeler les actes de notre prophète.;Das Bema ist das wichtigste religiöse Ereignis für uns Manichäer. Es wird zu Ehren des Propheten Mani und seines Leidens in den Händen von Shahanshah Shapur I abgehalten. Während der Frühlings-Tagundnachtgleiche sammeln wir uns
column5: um uns an die Taten unseres Propheten zu erinnern.;;El Bema es el evento religioso más importante para nosotros
column6: los maniqueos. Se celebra en honor del profeta Mani y su sufrimiento a manos de Shahanshah Shapur I. En el equinoccio de primavera nos reunimos para recordar los hechos de nuestro profeta.;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC39813;You have been invited to join your liege
column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: at the Bema feast [From.GetSheHe] is hosting this year. This ritual dinner is held during vernal equinox and involves remembering the life and death of our Prophet Mani.;Vous avez été invité[Root.Get_E] à rejoindre votre [From.GetLordLady] lige
column4: [From.Get_le_TitledFirstName]
column5: à la fête de Bêma qu'[From.GetIlElle] organise cette année. Ce dîner rituel se déroule pendant l'équinoxe de printemps et consiste à se souvenir de la vie et de la mort de notre Prophète Mani.;Ihr wurdet eingeladen
column6: Euch Eurem Lehnsherrn [From.GetTitledFirstName] zum diesjährigen Bema-Fest anzuschließen. Dieses rituelle Essen findet während der Frühlings-Tagundnachtgleiche statt und beinhaltet die Erinnerung an das Leben und den Tod unseres Propheten Mani.;;Se te ha invitado a unirte a tu señor
column7: [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column8: a la fiesta del Bema que tendrá lugar este año. Esta cena ritual se celebra durante el equinoccio de primavera e implica rememorar la vida y muerte de nuestro profeta Mani.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39813;How kind!;Comme c'est gentil !;Wie nett!;;¡Qué amable!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB39813;Unfortunately
column2: I have other plans.;Malheureusement
column3: j'ai d'autres choses prévues.;Leider habe ich schon andere Pläne.;;Por desgracia tengo otros planes;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC39814;[From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused your invitation to the Bema festival
column2: claiming [From.GetSheHe] has other plans.;[From.Get_Le_TitledFirstName] a refusé votre invitation à la fête de Bêma
column3: en prétendant qu'[From.GetIlElle] avait d'autres choses prévues.;[From.GetTitledFirstName] lehnte Eure Einladung zum Bema-Fest
column4: mit dem Vorwand andere Pläne zu haben
column5: ab.;;[From.GetTitledFirstName] ha rechazado tu invitación a la fiesta del Bema afirmando que tiene otros planes.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39814;I see.;Je vois.;Ich verstehe.;;Entiendo.;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC39815;The festival begins. The five-stepped altar has been covered in precious fabrics. Guests have fasted before the festival to purify themselves for the holy occasion. As the Mahistan leading the ceremony kneels in prayer
column2: everyone else does the same and bows their heads.;La fête commence. L'autel en haut de cinq marches a été recouvert de tissus précieux. Les invités ont jeûné avant la fête pour se purifier pour l'événement sacré. Alors que le mahistan menant la cérémonie s'agenouille pour la prière
column3: tout le monde fait de même et s'incline.;Das Fest beginnt. Der fünfstufige Altar ist mit edlen Stoffen bedeckt. Die Gäste haben vor dem Fest gefastet
column4: um sich für den heiligen Anlass zu reinigen. Als der Mahistan
column5: der die Zeremonie führt
column6: für ein Gebet niederkniet
column7: machen alle anderen selbiges und beugen den Kopf.;;La fiesta comienza. El altar de cinco escalones ha sido cubierto de telas preciosas. Los invitados han ayunado antes de la fiesta para purificarse para la ocasión sagrada. Cuando el mahistan que dirige la ceremonia se inclina para orar
column8: todos hacen lo mismo
column9: inclinando sus cabezas.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39815;Glory to Mani!;Gloire à Mani !;Ruhm zu Mani!;;¡Gloria a Mani!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC39816;Bema goes on for a long time
column2: with prayers
column3: remembrance of Mani's deeds and studying of the holy books. All those in attendance feel humbled by the wisdom of our Prophet. Truly
column4: Mani
column5: the Seal of the Prophets
column6: was a blessing for all mankind.;Le Bêma se poursuit avec des prières
column7: le rappel des actes de Mani et l'étude des livres sacrés. Tous ceux qui y assistent se sentent humbles face à la sagesse de notre Prophète. Mani
column8: le Sceau des prophètes
column9: était vraiment une bénédiction pour toute l'humanité.;Das Bema geht eine ganze Zeit
column10: mit Gebeten
column11: Erinnerungen an Manis Taten und dem Studium der heiligen Bücher. Alle
column12: die anwesend sind
column13: fühlen sich durch die Weisheit unseres Propheten demütig. Wahrlich war Mani
column14: das Siegel der Propheten
column15: ein Segen für die ganze Menschheit.;;El Bema continúa durante mucho tiempo con oraciones
column16: recuerdos de los hechos de Mani y estudiando los libros sagrados. Todos los que atienden sienten humildad ante la sabiduría del profeta. Desde luego
column17: Mani
column19: fue una bendición para toda la humanidad.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39816;Praise Zurvan!;Louons Zurvan !;Lobet Zurvan!;;¡Alabemos a Zurván!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC39817;The Bema lasts well into the night
column2: but all good things must end. You return home to celebrate the rest of Passover
column3: but you and most of the other guests seem to agree that the Bema dinner was well worth the trip.;Le Bêma dure encore une partie de la nuit
column4: mais même les bonnes choses ont une fin. Vous rentrez chez vous pour célébrer le reste de la Pâque
column5: mais vous et la plupart des autres invités semblez convenir que le dîner du Bêma valait bien le voyage.;Das Bema dauerte bis spät in die Nacht
column6: aber alle guten Dinge müssen enden. Ihr kehrt nach Hause zurück
column7: um den Rest des Passahfestes zu feiern. Ihr und die meisten anderen Gäste sind sich aber einig
column8: dass das Bema die Reise wert war.;;El Bema se alarga mucho en la noche
column9: pero todas las cosas buenas deben acabar. Regresas a casa para celebrar el resto de la Pascua
column10: pero la mayoría de los demás invitados y tú parecen coincidir en que la cena del Bema mereció el viaje.;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_SIEGE_EVENTS_ON_DESC;Various events may occur for both sides during sieges.;Les événements de siège ordinaires peuvent se produire pour les deux camps.;Zahlreiche Ereignisse können während einer Belagerung für beide Seiten auftreten.;;Durante los asedios pueden ocurrir varios eventos para ambos bandos.;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_SIEGE_EVENTS_OFF_DESC;No regular siege events may occur for either side.;Les événements de siège ordinaires ne se produisent pour aucun camp.;Es treten keine Ereignisse während einer Belagerung für beide Seiten auf.;;No habrá eventos normales de asedio para ningún bando.;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_SIEGE_EVENTS_DEFENDERS_DESC;Siege events may affect only the defenders.;Les événements de siège n'affectent que les défenseurs.;Belagerungsereignisse beeinflussen nur den Verteidiger.;;Los eventos de asedio solo afectarán a los defensores.;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_MULTIPLAYER_ASSASSINATIONS_NO_CLOSE_PLAYER_RELATIVES_DESC;Plotting to kill other players or their close relatives is disabled.;Comploter afin de tuer d'autres joueurs ou leurs proches parents est impossible.;Der Versuch

RULE_MULTIPLAYER_PLAYER_INVASIONS_ON_DESC;Players can use all Invasion Casus Bellis freely.;Les joueurs peuvent utiliser les casus belli d'invasion librement.;Spieler können alle Invasion-Kriegsgründe nach freiem Ermessen benutzen.;;Los jugadores pueden usar libremente todos los casus belli de invasión.;;;;;;;;;x
RULE_MULTIPLAYER_PLAYER_INVASIONS_OFF_DESC;All Invasion Casus Bellis except Prepared Invasions and those granted by a Religious Head are disabled for players.;Tous les casus belli d'invasion
column2: hormis les invasions planifiées et celles accordées par un chef religieux
column3: sont désactivés pour les joueurs.;Alle Invasion-Kriegsgründe
column4: abgesehen von vorbereiteten Invasionen und solchen
column5: die von einem religiösen Oberhaupt gewährt werden
column6: sind für Spieler deaktiviert.;;Todos los casus belli de invasión están desactivados para los jugadores excepto invasiones preparadas y los otorgados por líderes religiosos.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: RULE_MULTIPLAYER_3RD_PARTY_CLAIMS;Multiplayer 3rd Party Claims;Revendication de tiers en multijoueurs;Mehrspieler: Ansprüche an Dritte;;Multijugador derechos de terceros;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_MULTIPLAYER_3RD_PARTY_CLAIMS_ON_DESC;Players can freely Press the Claims of other characters.;Les joueurs peuvent librement appuyer une revendication d'un autre personnage.;Spieler können Ansprüche anderer Charaktere nach freiem Ermessen durchsetzen.;;Los jugadores pueden reclamar libremente los derechos de otros personajes.;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_MULTIPLAYER_3RD_PARTY_CLAIMS_OFF_DESC;Players cannot Press the Claims of other characters.;Les joueurs ne peuvent pas appuyer une revendication d'un autre personnage.;Spieler können die Ansprüche anderer Charaktere nicht durchsetzen.;;Los jugadores no pueden reclamar los derechos de otros personajes.;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_MULTIPLAYER_3RD_PARTY_CLAIMS_LIMITED_DESC;Players can only Press Duchy or lower Claims of other characters.;Les joueurs peuvent uniquement appuyer une revendication ducale ou faible d'un autre personnage.;Spieler können nur Ansprüche auf der Stufe eines Herzogs oder niedriger von anderen Charakteren durchsetzen.;;Los jugadores solo pueden reclamar derechos de ducado o inferior de otros personajes.;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_EDU_FOCUSES_ALL_DESC;Players are alerted about Childhood and Education Focuses for all children at court.;Les joueurs sont alertés à propos des intérêts d'enfance et d'éducation de tous les enfants à la Cour.;Spieler werden über Kindheits- und Bildungsfokusse aller Kinder am Hof informiert.;;Se alerta a los jugadores de los enfoques de Infancia y Educación de todos los niños de la corte.;;;;;;;;;x
RULE_EDU_FOCUSES_CR;Close Relatives;Proches parents;Nahe Verwandte;;Parientes cercanos;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_EDU_FOCUSES_CR_DESC;Players are alerted about Childhood and Education Focuses for close relatives of their own dynasty.;Les joueurs sont alertés à propos des intérêts d'enfance et d'éducation des proches parents de leur dynastie.;Spieler werden über Kindheits- und Bildungsfokusse für nahe Verwandte ihrer eigenen Dynastie informiert.;;Se alerta a los jugadores de los enfoques de Infancia y Educación de parientes cercanos de su propia dinastía.;;;;;;;;;x
RULE_OPTION_MINIMAL;Minimal;Minimum;Minimal;;Mínima;;;;;;;;;x

RULE_EDU_FOCUSES_MINIMAL_DESC;Players are only alerted about their own character's and their primary heir's Childhood and Education Focuses.;Les joueurs ne sont alertés qu'à propos des intérêts d'enfance et d'éducation de leur personnage et de son héritier principal.;Spieler werden nur über Kindheits- und Bildungsfokusse ihrer eigenen und der ihres direkten Erben informiert.;;Solo se alerta a los jugadores de los enfoques de Infancia y Educación propios y de su principal heredero.;;;;;;;;;x
celebrate_jashan_e_sadah;Hold Jashn-e Sadeh Festival;Organiser la fête de Sadeh;Sadeh-Fest halten;;Celebrar festival Jashn-e Sadeh;;;;;;;;;x

celebrate_jashan_e_sadah_desc;Invite your vassals to celebrate the Sadeh festival.;Inviter vos vassaux à la fête de Sadeh.;Vasallen zum Sadeh-Fest einladen;;Invita a tus vasallos a celebrar el festival de Sadeh;;;;;;;;;x
BLORG_CO_held_sadah_timer;Held Jashn-e Sadeh;A organisé une fête de Sadeh;Sadeh abhalten;;Celebrar Jashn-e Sadeh;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC39820;According to legend
column2: Persian king Hushang discovered the secret of fire in the hallowed past and brought it to benefit all people. We Mazdans celebrate this with the 'Jashn-e-Sadeh' festival. It is held to honor fire and to defeat the forces of darkness
column3: frost
column4: and cold.;Selon la légende
column5: le roi perse Hushang a découvert le secret du feu dans le passé sacré et en a fait profiter toutes les personnes. Nous
column6: les mazdéens
column7: célébrons cela avec la fête 'Jashneh Sadeh'. Il est tenu en l'honneur du feu et pour vaincre les forces de l'obscurité
column8: du givre et du froid.;Einer Legende zufolge entdeckte der persische König Huschang
column9: in seiner verfluchten Kindheit
column10: das Geheimnis des Feuers und brachte es allen Menschen zugute. Wir Mazdanier zelebrieren dies mit dem Jadeh-Fest. Es wird gehalten
column11: um das Feuer zu ehren und die Kräfte der Finsternis
column12: des Frostes und der Kälte zu besiegen.;;Según la leyenda
column13: el rey persa Hushang descubrió el secreto del fuego del pasado sagrado y lo recuperó para beneficiar a todas las gentes. Nosotros
column14: los mazdeístas
column15: celebramos con esto el festival 'Jashn-e Sadeh'. Se hace para honrar al fuego y derrotar las fuerzas de la oscuridad
column16: la escarcha y el frío.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39820;Send out the invitations!;Envoyez les invitations !;Einladungen verschicken!;;¡Enviad invitaciones!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC39821;Your liege
column2: [From.GetTitledName]
column3: has sent you an invitation to a Jashan-e-Sadeh festival
column4: so that the whole realm might celebrate the glory of fire and wish for the return of spring!;Votre [From.GetLordLady] lige
column5: [From.Get_le_TitledName]
column6: vous a envoyé une invitation à une fête de Sadeh
column7: afin que tout le monde puisse célébrer la gloire du feu et souhaiter le retour du printemps !;Euer Lehnsherr [From.GetTitledName] hat Euch eine Einladung zum Jadeh-Fest geschickt
column8: damit das ganze Reich die Herrlichkeit des Feuers und die Rückkehr des Frühlings feiern kann!;;Tu señor
column9: [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column10: te ha invitado al festival Jashn-e Sadeh
column11: ¡para que el reino entero celebre la gloria del fuego y el deseo del retorno de la primavera!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39821;Of course I will attend!;Bien sûr que je vais y assister !;Natürlich werde ich teilnehmen!;;¡Por supuesto que acudiré!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTTOOLTIP_39821;Receives an invitation;Reçoit une invitation;Erhält eine Einladung;;Recibe una invitación;;;;;;;;;x

column2: [From.GetTitledName]
column3: has refused your invitation to the Sadeh festival...;Votre vassal[From.Get_E]
column4: [From.Get_le_TitledName]

column6: [From.GetTitledName]
column7: ha rechazado tu invitación al festival de Sadeh;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39822;Well
column2: I don't like [From.GetObjectPronoun] either;Eh bien
column3: je ne l'apprécie pas non plus;Na ja
column4: ich mag [From.GetHerHim] auch nicht wirklich.;;Bueno
column5: a mí tampoco me gusta [From.GetSheHe];;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC39823;A festive mood is in the air! Bonfires are being built near the temples and lakes
column2: fathers have taken their sons to gather wood for the pyres
column3: while the women prepare food for the festival.;Une ambiance festive est dans l'air ! Des feux de joie sont construits près des temples et des lacs
column4: les pères ont emmené leurs fils pour ramasser du bois pour les bûchers funéraires
column5: tandis que les femmes préparent la nourriture pour la fête.;Eine festliche Stimmung liegt in der Luft! In der Nähe der Tempel und Seen werden große Feuer aufgebaut und Väter haben ihre Söhne zum Holzsammeln mitgenommen
column6: während die Frauen das Essen vorbereiten.;;¡Hay ambiente de festival en el aire! Se levantan hogueras cercas de los templos y los padres llevan a los hijos a reunir leña para las hogueras
column7: mientras que las mujeres preparan comida para el festival.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39823;Whoever does not give a branch
column2: may God not grant their wish!;À celui qui ne donne pas de branche
column3: que Dieu n'accorde pas son souhait !;Wer keinen Zweig darlegt
column4: dem möge Gott auch keinen Wunsch erfüllen.;;¡Dios no concederá su deseo a quien no traiga una rama!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC39824;All is ready for the Jashn-e-Sadeh. The temples are full of worshippers
column2: people gather wood for the fires and a festive mood is growing.;Tout est prêt pour le Jashneh Sadeh. Les temples sont remplis d'adorateurs
column3: les gens ramassent du bois pour les feux et une ambiance festive s'installe.;Alles ist bereit für das Jadeh. Die Tempel sind voller Anhänger
column4: Menschen sammeln Holz für die Feuer und die festliche Stimmung wächst.;;Todo está listo para el Jashn-e-Sadeh. Los templos están llenos de fieles
column5: la gente reúne leña para las hogueras y el ambiente festivo crece.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39824;I must make sure bring some wood too;Je dois m'assurer d'apporter du bois moi aussi;Ich muss auch etwas Holz sammeln;;Debo asegurarme de llevar también algo de leña;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC39825;A group of priests carry the sacred fire to the throne room. Your vassals follow them and are directed to their seats by servants.;Un groupe de prêtres transporte le feu sacré dans la salle du trône. Vos vassaux les suivent et sont amenés à leurs sièges par des serviteurs.;Eine Gruppe Priester trägt das heilige Feuer in den Thronsaal. Eure Vasallen folgen ihnen und werden von Dienern auf ihre Sitze geleitet.;;Un grupo de sacerdotes lleva el fuego sagrado a la sala del trono. Tus vasallos los siguen y los sirvientes les guían a sus asientos.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA39825;Let us celebrate the glory of Ohrmazd!;Célébrons la gloire d'Ohrmazd !;Lasst uns die Herrlichkeit von Ohrmazd feiern!;;¡Celebremos la gloria de Ohrmazd!;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC39826;A group of Mobads has brought forth a sacred fire from a nearby temple. You and other guests follow them to your liege's feast hall and take your designated seats in the banquet table.;Un groupe de mobads a fait un feu sacré à un temple voisin. Vous et les autres invités les suivez dans la salle de fête de votre [Root.Liege.GetLordLady] lige et prenez place aux sièges désignés à la table du banquet.;Eine Gruppe Mobaden hat ein heiliges Feuer aus einem nahe gelegenen Tempel gebracht. Ihr und anderen Gäste folgen ihnen zu der Festhalle Eures Lehnsherrn
column2: wo alle ihre festgelegten Plätze am Banketttisch einnehmen.;;Un grupo de mobads trae un fuego sagrado de un templo cercano. Otros invitados y tú los seguís a la sala de banquetes de tu señor y tomáis los asientos indicados en la mesa del banquete.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC39827;The celebrations are finally over. You have feasted on bountiful food while outside the bonfires have burned out
column2: having successfully driven away the demons of frost and cold. Soon the light of summer shall be upon us!;Les célébrations sont finalement terminées. Vous vous êtes régalé pendant qu'à l'extérieur les feux de joie ont brûlé
column3: ayant chassé avec succès les démons du gel et du froid. Bientôt la lumière de l'été sera sur nous !;Die Festlichkeiten sind endlich vorbei. Ihr habt mit reichlich Essen gefeiert
column4: während außerhalb die Lagerfeuer ausgebrannt sind
column5: nachdem sie erfolgreich die Dämonen des Frostes und der Kälte vertrieben haben. Bald wird das Licht des Sommers auf uns liegen!;;Las celebraciones han terminado por fin. Os habéis dado un festín con comida abundante mientras fuera se han extinguido las hogueras
column6: habiendo expulsado con éxito a los demonios de la escarcha y el frío. ¡Pronto las luz del verano estará con nosotros!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39827;Until next time!;Jusqu'à la prochaine fois !;Bis zum nächsten Mal!;;¡Hasta la próxima vez!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC39828;The feast is over. Priests carry the sacred fire back to the temple while outside the bonfires have burned out
column2: having successfully driven away the demons of frost and cold. Soon the light of summer shall be upon us!;La fête est terminée. Les prêtres transportent le feu sacré vers le temple
column3: tandis que les feux de joie ont brûlé
column4: ayant chassé avec succès les démons du gel et du froid. Bientôt la lumière de l'été sera sur nous !;Das Fest ist vorbei. Priester tragen das heilige Feuer zurück in den Tempel
column5: während außerhalb die letzten Feuer erlöschen
column6: nachdem sie erfolgreich die Dämonen des Frostes und der Kälte vertrieben haben. Bald wird das Licht des Sommers auf uns liegen!;;El banquete ha terminado. Los sacerdotes devuelven el fuego sagrado al templo mientras fuera se han extinguido las hogueras
column7: habiendo expulsado con éxito a los demonios de la escarcha y el frío. ¡Pronto las luz del verano estará con nosotros!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC39830;As part of the Jashn-e-Sadeh
column2: the Mobads bless their communities with Atash Niyayesh - the litany of fire. As a sovereign
column3: you are expected to attend the ceremony in your capital.;Dans le cadre du Jashneh Sadeh
column4: les mobads bénissent leurs communautés avec Atash Niyayesh - la litanie du feu. En tant que souverain[Root.Get_E]
column5: vous devriez assister à la cérémonie dans votre capitale.;Als Teil des Jadeh segnen die Mobaden ihre Gemeinden mit Atash Niyayesh""
column6: der Litanei des Feuers. Als Souverän solltet Ihr an der Zeremonie in Eurer Hauptstadt teilnehmen.;;Como parte del Jashn-e-Sadeh
column7: los mobads bendicen a sus comunidades con Atash Niyayesh
column8: la letanía del fuego. Como soberano
column9: se espera que asistas a la ceremonia en tu capital.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39830;It is for the glory of Zurvan!;C'est pour la gloire de Zurvan !;Für die Herrlichkeit von Zurvan!;;¡Es por la gloria de Zurván!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA39831;It is for the glory of Zurvan!;C'est pour la gloire de Zurvan !;Für die Herrlichkeit von Zurvan!;;¡Es por la gloria de Zurván!;;;;;;;;;x

EVTOPT39830_ZEAL;Heathens are no match for light of Zurvan!;Les infidèles ne font rien pour la lumière de Zurvan !;Heiden sind kein Gegner für Zurvan!;;¡Los herejes no son rivales para la luz de Zurván!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_CHAR;The Mobads appreciate my gifts;Les mobads apprécient mes cadeaux;Die Mobaden schätzen meine Geschenke;;Los mobads aprecian mis regalos;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_CYNIC;I will attend
column2: but I won't enjoy it...;Je vais y assister
column3: sans y croire...;Ich werde zwar teilnehmen
column4: es aber nicht genießen...;;Asistiré
column5: pero no lo disfrutaré;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT39830_POSS;I don't think my seizure inspired confidence in the people...;Je ne pense pas que ma saisie ait inspiré la confiance des gens...;Ich glaube nicht
column2: dass meine Darbringung das Vertrauen der Menschen inspirierte...;;No creo que mi confiscación inspire confianza en el pueblo;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT39830_THEO;My faith is renewed!;Ma foi est renouvelée !;Mein Glaube ist gefestigt!;;¡Mi fe se ha renovado!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_ADMIN;My rule is example to everyone!;Mon règne est un exemple pour tous !;Meine Herrschaft ist beispielhaft!;;¡Mi gobierno es un ejemplo para los demás!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_STRESSED;I feel more relaxed!;Je me sens plus détendu[Root.Get_E]!;Ich fühle mich entspannter!;;¡Me siento más relajado!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_PROUD;The peasants should feel honored that I showed up!;Les paysans devraient se sentir honorés que je me sois présenté !;Die Bauern können sich geehrt fühlen
column2: dass ich gekommen bin!;;¡Que los campesinos se sientan honrados de que haya aparecido!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT39830_LUST;I shall frolic with some attractive peasants afterwards!;Je batifolerai ensuite avec les séduisant[This.Get_EPreference]s paysa[This.GetNNnePreference]s !;Ich werde mich später mit einigen attraktiven Bauern vergnügen!;;¡Ya retozaré después con campesinas atractivas!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_LUNATIC;AAHHUHUHHAARA MAZDAA!!!;HOURRAAAA MAZDAA !!!;AAHHUHUHHAARA MAZDAA!!!;;¡¡¡AAHHUHUHHAARA MAZDAA!!!;;;;;;;;;x

EVTOPT39830_POET;I will also honor Zoroaster with a poem...;Je vais également honorer Zoroastre avec un poème...;Ich werde zudem die Zoroastrier mit einem Gedicht ehren...;;También honraré a Zoroastro con un poema;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_GLUTTON;Bottoms up afterwards!;Cul sec ensuite !;Hoch die Tassen!;;¡Y luego
column2: a empinar el codo!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT39830_GREG;May the realm prosper!;Puisse le pays prospérer !;Möge das Reich blühen!;;¡Que el reino prospere!;;;;;;;;;x

EVTOPT39830_HUMBLE;I shall also go and gather Camelthorn for the fire...;Je vais aussi chercher de l'acacia à girafe pour le feu...;Ich sollte auch etwas Kameldorn für das Feuer sammeln...;;También iré a buscar alhagi para el fuego;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39830_SOLDIER;This blessing shall aid me in battle!;Cette bénédiction m'aidera dans la bataille !;Dieser Segen soll mir im Kampf helfen!;;¡Esta bendición me ayudará en la batalla!;;;;;;;;;x

EVTOPT39830_SCHOLAR;Talking with the Mobads is always fascinating.;Parler avec les mobads est toujours fascinant.;Mit den Mobaden zu sprechen ist immer faszinierend.;;Hablar con los mobads siempre es fascinante.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39831_HEDONIST;I think I'll mingle with the commoners...;Je pense que je me mêlerai aux roturiers...;Ich denke
column2: ich mische mich unters Volk...;;Creo que me mezclaré con los plebeyos;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT39831_CYNIC;This is a waste of my time...;C'est un gaspillage de mon temps...;Das ist Verschwendung meiner Zeit...;;Es una pérdida de tiempo;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT39831_GREG;An excellent opportunity to talk to the other lords!;Une excellente occasion de parler aux autres seigneurs !;Eine ausgezeichnete Gelegenheit
column2: mit anderen Fürsten zu sprechen!;;¡Una oportunidad excelente de hablar con otros señores!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT39831_STRESSED;This kind of festival is quite relaxing...;Ce genre de fête est plutôt relaxant...;Diese Art Fest ist sehr entspannend...;;Esta clase de festival es bastante relajante;;;;;;;;;x

ZEUS_EDUCATOR_DESC;The Educator acts as a teacher and mentor to children. By default
column2: rulers act as Educators to all children at court. However
column3: if there is a Teacher (Honorary Title) assigned
column4: the Teacher will be the default Educator instead. You can also assign a specific character as the Guardian of a child. If a Guardian is assigned
column5: the child goes to live in the same court as the Guardian
column6: and it's not possible to declare war on someone who has a close relative child in their court.;L'éducateur agit comme professeur pour les enfants. Par défaut
column7: le dirigeant est l'éducateur pour tous les enfants de la cour. Cependant
column8: s'il y a un Professeur (Titre honorifique) attribué
column9: il occupera la place de l'éducateur par défaut. Vous pouvez également attribuer un personnage spécifique en tant que tuteur d'un enfant. Dans un tel cas
column10: l'enfant vivra à la même cour que le tuteur
column11: et il n'est pas possible de déclarer la guerre à quelqu'un qui a un proche parent à sa cour.;Der Erzieher fungiert als Lehrer und Mentor für Kinder. Standardmäßig fungiert der Herrscher als Erzieher für alle Kinder am Hofe. Wenn allerdings ein Lehrer (Ehrentitel) zugewiesen wurde
column12: wird der Lehrer stattdessen als Standard-Erzieher zugewiesen. Ihr könnt auch einen bestimmten Charakter direkt als Erziehungsberechtigten zuweisen. Wenn ein Erziehungsberechtigter zugeteilt wird
column13: wohnt das Kind am gleichen Hofe wie er und es ist nicht möglich
column14: jemand den Krieg zu erklären
column15: der ein nahes verwandtes Kind am Hof beherbergt.;;El educador actúa como maestro y mentor de niños. Por defecto
column16: los gobernantes actúan como educadores de todos los niños de la corte. Sin embargo
column17: si hay un maestro (título honorario) asignado
column18: este será el educador por defecto. También puedes asignar a un personaje específico ser el tutor de un niño. Con un tutor asignado
column19: el niño irá a vivir a la misma corte que este
column20: y no se puede declarar guerra a alguien con un niño pariente cercano en su corte.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: blorg_open;Open;Ouverte;Offen;;Abierto;;;;;;;;;x
blorg_open_desc;The Blorg Commonality is currently open to trade and interested in acquiring friends and tributaries within its sphere of influence.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
blorg_isolationist;Isolationist;Isolationniste;Isolationist;;Aislacionista;;;;;;;;;x

blorg_isolationist_desc;The Blorg Commonality has turned inward and is mostly ignoring its primitive neighbors. All actions to gain the Archon's favour or request boons are invalid. New Tributary states will likely not be accepted.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
blorg_expansionist;Expansionist;Expansionniste;Expansionist;;Expansionista;;;;;;;;;x
blorg_expansionist_desc;The Emperor is showing a rare interest in the rest of the world. the Blorg Commonality might aggressively seek to gain new Tributary states
column2: or even stage a major invasion to 'pacify the North'.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x"

column1: blorg_jurchen_invasion_desc;An enormous horde of ??? warriors has descended upon the Blorg Commonality from the ???. The mighty Blorg armies are preoccupied with a desperate defense against the fierce invaders. The war is disrupting trade along the River of Gold and could cause a mass exodus of refugees. Should the Liberians triumph
column2: it is possible that scions of the current Dynasty may flee northward with the remnants of their forces.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: NEWS_FROM_blorg;News from the Blorg Commonality;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50021_EXP;The great [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] of the Blorg Commonality has suddenly taken a keen interest in the rest of the world

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50031_UNREST;[FromFrom.GetBlorgPreviousStatusEnd]. Popular uprisings have broken out in [GetRandomblorgRegion] and large groups of disgruntled peasants have taken up arms
column2: led by [GetRandomblorgFaction]. Trade has been halved along the River of Gold and the Blorg Commonality will not be able to defend its Tributary states.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50031_PLAGUE;[FromFrom.GetBlorgPreviousStatusEnd]. The Pale Rider is sowing his deadly seeds in the Blorg Commonality - a Devastating Plague has broken out in [GetRandomblorgRegion]. No goods travel along the River of Gold as the merchants fear infection. Even so
column2: the deadly scourge is spreading quickly
column3: and the troubles of the Blorg Commonality could soon be ours... the Blorg Commonality will not be able to assist its Tributary states.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50031_CW;[FromFrom.GetBlorgPreviousStatusEnd]. Civil War now rocks the Blorg Commonality as a rebellious governor has managed to gather support from the local military officers in [GetRandomblorgRegion]. Golden River profits are halved and Tributary states can use this opportunity to break free - the Blorg Commonality will not be able to assist them should they be attacked anyway.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50031_GOLDEN;[FromFrom.GetBlorgPreviousStatusEnd]. Harmony and progress are blossoming throughout the Blorg Commonality under the benevolent rule of [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. New types of precious gems and other wondrous new wares have started to flow along the increasingly safe routes of the River of Gold
column2: whose wealth has doubled!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50141_BOOST;With the Blorg Commonality already suffering from the [offmap_blorg.GetPrevStatus]
column2: a great host of Congolese warriors
column3: under the leadership of their great Manikongo
column4: has decided to exploit the situation and has crossed into Southern the Blorg Commonality. Will the fierce warriors from the vast jungle manage to clip the Eagle's wings?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50141_PENALTY;Right when the Blorg Commonality is experiencing an almost unprecedented [offmap_blorg.GetPrevStatus]
column2: a great host from the Congo has crossed into Douala
column3: intent on conquering the whole commonality
column4: but the Eagle is mighty and the fierce jungle warriors are in for a titanic struggle.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50141;Most inauspicious!;Vraiment fâcheux !;Sehr ungünstig!;;¡Qué poco propicio!;;;;;;;;;x
INTERESTING;Interesting...;Intéressant...;Interessant...;;Interesante;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50161;After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers
column2: the veteran armies of the Blorg Commonality finally managed to win a decisive battle near [GetRandomblorgRegion]. The Congolese Manikongo was slain and his Garde Impériale slaughtered to the last man.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50161;Beware the Three-Crowned Eagle...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50162;After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers
column2: the Congolese finally stand triumphant. The decisive battle was fought near [GetRandomblorgRegion]. The Manikongo now sits upon the Eagle Throne as [offmap_blorg.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [offmap_blorg.Ruler.GetDynName]
column3: founder of a new Dynasty! However
column4: the Blorg Commonality is likely to suffer Unrest for many years to come...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50162;The Congolese truly are fearsome!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50181_BOOST;With the Blorg Commonality already suffering from the [offmap_blorg.GetPrevStatus]
column2: an additional misfortune has struck the Land of Gold - the city-states and petty-kings of the West African Coast have united under a great warlord from Liberia. A great horde of fierce warriors is now crossing into the Blorg Commonality from the West. Clearly
column3: this is no ordinary raid to test Blorg defenses.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50181_PENALTY;Right when the Blorg Commonality is experiencing an almost unprecedented [offmap_blorg.GetPrevStatus]
column2: a great army under the rulership of a Liberian warlord has crossed the Volta river
column3: invading Western the Blorg Commonality. However
column4: the Eagle is mighty and the fierce steppe warriors are in for a titanic struggle
column5: for the great riches of the Divine Land are defended by a million well-equipped soldiers...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50201;After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers
column2: the veteran armies of the Blorg Commonality finally managed to win a decisive battle near [GetRandomblorgRegion]. The Liberian Warleader was slain and his elite guards slaughtered to the last man.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50201;The Eagle soars...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50202;After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers
column2: the Liberians finally stand triumphant. The decisive battle was fought near [GetRandomblorgRegion]. The Liberian Warleader now sits upon the Eagle Throne as [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]
column3: founder of a new Dynasty! However
column4: the Blorg Commonality is likely to suffer Unrest for many years to come...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50202;These Liberians sound dangerous...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50281_UNREST;The long period of Unrest and sporadic popular uprisings in the Blorg Commonality has turned into a full-blown Civil War! Many think that [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] is weak and that [FromFrom.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun] has surely been cursed by God. Even as [FromFrom.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun] cowers in [GetRandomblorgRegion]
column2: massive rebel armies are on the move
column3: attacking loyalist strongholds. Still
column4: the rebels have not yet gathered under a single leader
column5: and different factions are even fighting each other. Golden River profits are halved and Tributary states can use this opportunity to break free - the Blorg Commonality will not be able to assist them should they be attacked anyway.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50281;A House Divided...;Une maison divisée...;Ein geteiltes Haus...;;Una casa dividida;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50301;The Blorg Civil War has come to an abrubt end. [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] utterly crushed the main rebel army in [GetRandomblorgRegion]
column2: ending the long years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances between loyalists
column3: rabble-rousing priests
column4: ethnic seperatists
column5: dynastic pretenders and an overly ambitious governor. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Golden Kingdom and the River of Gold is safe again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50301;Good

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50302_HAN_DYNASTY;After years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances
column2: the Blorg Civil War is finally over. The foreign dynasty has fallen and the Blorg Commonality is once more ruled by a native [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]. [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]
column3: the former governor of [GetRandomblorgRegion]
column4: defeated not just the loyalist armies
column5: but several rival rebel factions. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Golden Kingdom and the River of Gold is safe again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50302_NEW_DYNASTY;After years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances
column2: the Blorg Civil War is finally over. The leader of a warlike messianic sect from [GetRandomblorgRegion] has emerged victorious and now rules as [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. A populist ruler
column3: the new [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] has cleaned out the corrupt bureaucrats of the old regime. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Golden Kingdom and the River of Gold is safe again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT_BLORG_CO_50302_BROKEN_PEACE_DEAL;Curses
column2: there goes my Peace Deal with the Blorg Commonality!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_BLORG_CO_50303;After years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances
column2: the Blorg Civil War is finally over. The old regime has fallen and [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]
column3: a pretender prince of the old [FromFrom.Ruler.Dynasty.GetName] has emerged victorious and now sits upon the Eagle Throne. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Golden Kingdom and the River of Gold is safe again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pet_masterless_dog;Vohunazga Guardian;Garde un Vohunazga;Vohunazga-Herr;;Guardián de Vohunazga;;;;;;;;;x

pet_masterless_dog_desc;This character is the guardian of a masterless dog who defends his home from evil spirits.;Ce personnage est le gardien d'un chien sans maître qui défend sa demeure des mauvais esprits.;Diese Person ist der Wächter eines herrenlosen Hundes
column2: der sein Heim vor den Geschöpfen des Bösen beschützt.;;Este personaje es el guardián de un perro sin amo que defiende su hogar de los espíritus malignos.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pet_house_dog;House Dog;Chien de maison;Haushund;;Perro doméstico;;;;;;;;;x

pet_house_dog_desc;This character has taken in a dog into his house which defends him from evil spirits.;Ce personnage a pris un chien dans sa demeure qui le défend des mauvais esprits.;Diese Person hat einen Hund bei sich aufgenommen
column2: der ihn vor den Geschöpfen des Bösen beschützt.;;Este personaje ha adoptado un perro que defiende su casa de los espíritus malignos.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pet_hedgehog;Vanghapara Pet;Vanghapara comme animal de compagnie;Vanghapara-Haustier;;Mascota Vanghapara;;;;;;;;;x

pet_hedgehog_desc;This character has taken in a hedgehog into his house which happily in return hunts down vermin.;Ce personnage a emmené un hérisson dans sa demeure qui en retour est content de chasser les animaux nuisibles.;Diese Person hat einen Igel bei sich aufgenommen
column2: der nun fröhlich Ungeziefer jagt;;Este personaje ha adoptado un erizo. A cambio
column3: él mantiene el hogar libre de insectos.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pet_otter;Sag-e Aabi Guardian;Garde un Sag-e Aabi;Sag-e-Aabi-Herr;;Guardián de Sag-e Aabi;;;;;;;;;x

pet_otter_desc;This character is the guardian of an otter which ensures the wellbeing of the realm.;Ce personnage est le gardien d'un chien à loutre qui assure le bien-être du Royaume.;Diese Person ist der Herr eines Otters
column2: der dafür sorgt
column3: dass es dem Reich gut geht.;;Este personaje es el guardián de una nutria que garantizará el bienestar del reino.;;;;;;;;;x
